name: Charlotte Brontë—Century Series
description: Artist :: Chad Griffin :: This artwork is a unique, digitally-manipulated version of an original acrylic painting. Each work in this series is named after an individual that is meaningful to me, born over a hundred years ago and now deceased. All are powerful explorations of the duplicated icon and of the emotionality of color. They are meditations on the conflict between the beauty of a life lived and its brevity. 1024x1024 px :: 2.42s loop :: https://linktr.ee/chadwgriffin
